Hydras:

"Welcome, welxome welcome"hissed Hydras to the Minions"it seems th=
at we meet again, my uninvited guest... and I didnt expected to see you aga=
in, what bring you back to my magnificent Home?"




From: Super Cyclonus 
=
Sent: Tuesday, February 09, 2010 8:26 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subjec=
t: Re: New beginings


  
>"Good, I'll have something to do, I was starting=
 to get 
>bored" Said Hydras with irony while he pressed some buttons that =
opned the Black 
>Fortress's and the hidden internal defences too, he also =
send a hidden 
>comlink to his predacons "You can come in"
> 
>Perceptor an=
d Darkhawk ran towards the hydra's trone room, they were 
>ready for everyt=
hing. 

Cyclonus and Scourge continued their approach, cutting swift arcs t=
hrough the air. As the black fortress opened for the duo, for a moment it w=
as as if some large black beast opened its mouth and swallowed Cyclonus and=
 Scourge whole and then closed its mouth. 

Inside the the landing bay Cycl=
onus and Scourge quickly shifted form, gears grinding smoothly as they assu=
med their robotic modes. 

"You know they probably have defenses in place. =
I don't think Hydras liked out last visit." Scourge said as he glanced arou=
nd suspiciously, his voice low, his movements predatorilly graceful as he m=
oved.

Cyclonus nodded, his own keen optics taking in the room. "Yes, but h=
e is unlikely to attack us, at least not yet. But he is cautious, and that =
is good. Perhaps there is something of the elder spark still in him."

Scou=
rge glanced back at cyclonus, "Yeah, maybe."

"Come." Cyclonus said as he w=
alked towards the door that would take him to the elevator that would carry=
 them towards Hydras' command center. "We have much to discuss with Hydras.=
"

Scourge walked after Cyclonus, his head craning from one side to the oth=
er, his senses watchful. 

As the duo stepped into the door, the doors slid=
 shut and after a command from cyclonus the elevator began to move. Cyclonu=
s glanced at Scourge, "Be ready for anything."

Scourge nodded, a grim smil=
e appearing momentarilly on his faceplate, "Maybe its them who should be re=
ady for us!"

The elevator continued its trip, and finally opened to reveal=
 Hydras' throne room. . . 

<TAG>

Preston
(Cyclonus/Scourge)
